ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Tales of Terror Black & White Special Edition
ComicInfo.Summary:
Zenescope's Grimm Tales of Terror has been a big hit as a comic and now it's coming to the big screen as a feature film.
This Black & White Special Edition includes a brand new short story based on the upcoming film as well as the art and script from the fan favorite issue 'Black Cat.'
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Pasquale Qualano | 1 | B | Cover B | Richard Ortiz | 2 | C | Cover C | Abhishek Malsuni & Zsolt H. Garisa | 3 | D | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Jamie Tyndall | Missing | E | VIP Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Mike Krome | Missing |
